ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Enum-type representation of vectors and representation of intervals, including a method of coercing variables in data frames.
Enum-type representation of vectors and representation of intervals, including a method of coercing variables in data frames.

name: r-inum
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.0-5" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-inum
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/inum_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/inum/inum_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: e696b7e0b31b3bbf405112e60691b6a72fedcaa02e08ee517c59f6bf9cd36bbd

build:
  number: 3
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-libcoin >=1.0_0
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-libcoin >=1.0_0

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('inum')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('inum')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=inum
  license: GPL-2.0-only
  summary: Enum-type representation of vectors and representation of intervals, including a method of coercing variables in data frames.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: inum
# Title: Interval and Enum-Type Representation of Vectors
# Date: 2019-04-24
# Version: 1.0-1
# Authors@R: person("Torsten", "Hothorn", role = c("aut", "cre"), email = "Torsten.Hothorn@R-project.org")
# Description: Enum-type representation of vectors and representation of intervals, including a method of coercing variables in data frames.
# Depends: R (>= 3.3.0)
# Imports: stats, libcoin (>= 1.0-0)
# License: GPL-2
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2019-04-24 15:34:27 UTC; hothorn
# Author: Torsten Hothorn [aut, cre]
# Maintainer: Torsten Hothorn <Torsten.Hothorn@R-project.org>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-04-25 05:20:10 UTC
